title: Write documentation for the autoscaling APIs and policy/preferences syntax for Solr 7.0
description:
We need to document the following:

	set-policy
	set-cluster-preferences
	set-cluster-policy
	Autoscaling configuration read API
	Autoscaling diagnostics API
	policy and preference rule syntax

comments.content: I've started a branch called jira/solr-10821 for this issue.
comments.author: Shalin Shekhar Mangar
